m_szDocTitle: Jon Favreau Hypes Tesla Model X & Elon Musk On Jimmy Kimmel Live | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Jon Favreau Hypes Tesla Model X & Elon Musk On Jimmy Kimmel Live Originally published on EV Obsession . Actor/director Jon Favreau was recently on Jimmy Kimmel’s late night talk show, giving the well-known Tesla fan the opportunity to enthuse about the new Tesla Model X . Not a difficult thing to do, no doubt, as the electric SUV is, by all accounts so far, quite enjoyable to drive. All of that said, though, he does sound very enthusiastic about the Model X, doesn’t he? And apparently quite happy to say good things about Tesla CEO Elon Musk (also the man behind the space technology company Spa
